effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.sun_moon: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
